verses.verse: לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Why רָגְשׁ֣וּ <WH7283> rage גוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> Why do the heathen וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> and the people יֶהְגּוּ־ <WH1897> imagine רִֽיק׃ <WH7385> A vain

יִ֥תְיַצְּב֨וּ ׀ <WH3320> set מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> The kings אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְרוֹזְנִ֥ים <WH7336> themselves and the rulers נֽוֹסְדוּ־ <WH3245> take counsel יָ֑חַד <WH3162> together עַל־ <WH5921> Against יְ֝הוָה <WH3068> against the LORD וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <WH4899> and against his anointed
נְֽ֭נַתְּקָה <WH5423> asunder אֶת־ <WH853> מֽוֹסְרוֹתֵ֑ימוֹ <WH4147> their bands וְנַשְׁלִ֖יכָה <WH7993> and cast away מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> at עֲבֹתֵֽימוֹ׃ <WH5688> their cords
יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> He that sitteth בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> in the heavens יִשְׂחָ֑ק <WH7832> shall laugh אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord יִלְעַג־ <WH3932> shall have them in derision לָֽמוֹ׃

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> Then shall he speak אֵלֵ֣ימוֹ <WH413> to בְאַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> unto them in his wrath וּֽבַחֲרוֹנ֥וֹ <WH2740> them in his sore displeasure יְבַהֲלֵֽמוֹ׃ <WH926> and vex
וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> I נָסַ֣כְתִּי <WH5258> Yet have I set מַלְכִּ֑י <WH4428> my king עַל־ <WH5921> upon צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הַר־ <WH2022> hill קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> upon my holy

אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה <WH5608> I will declare אֶֽ֫ל <WH413> of חֹ֥ק <WH2706> the decree יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God אָמַ֘ר <WH559> hath said אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me בְּנִ֥י <WH1121> unto me Thou [art] my Son אַ֑תָּה <WH859> you אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> I הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> this day יְלִדְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH3205> have I begotten

שְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> Ask מִמֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> will surely וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> of me and I shall give ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> [thee] the heathen נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> [for] thine inheritance וַ֝אֲחֻזָּתְךָ֗ <WH272> [for] thy possession אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> and the uttermost parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

תְּ֭רֹעֵם <WH7489> Thou shalt break בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> them with a rod בַּרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> of iron כִּכְלִ֖י <WH3627> vessel יוֹצֵ֣ר <WH3335> like a potter's תְּנַפְּצֵֽם׃ <WH5310> thou shalt dash them in pieces
וְ֭עַתָּה <WH6258> Now מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> now therefore O ye kings הַשְׂכִּ֑ילוּ <WH7919> Be wise הִ֝וָּסְר֗וּ <WH3256> be instructed שֹׁ֣פְטֵי <WH8199> ye judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
עִבְד֣וּ <WH5647> Serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּיִרְאָ֑ה <WH3374> with fear וְ֝גִ֗ילוּ <WH1523> and rejoice בִּרְעָדָֽה׃ <WH7461> with trembling

נַשְּׁקוּ־ <WH5401> Kiss בַ֡ר <WH1248> the Son פֶּן־ <WH6435> not יֶאֱנַ֤ף ׀ <WH599> lest he be angry וְתֹ֬אבְדוּ <WH6> and ye perish דֶ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> [from] the way כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִבְעַ֣ר <WH1197> is kindled כִּמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> but a little אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> when his wrath אַ֝שְׁרֵ֗י <WH835> Blessed כָּל־ <WH3605> are all ח֥וֹסֵי <WH2620> [are] all they that put their trust בֽוֹ׃
